Flow.description: Update Invoice and related information based on conditions

value.stringValue: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > [Invoice__c].DueDate__c +60, TODAY() <= [Invoice__c].DueDate__c + 90 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - [Invoice__c].DueDate__c) + " days", "0" )

formulas.name: formula_10_myRule_1_A1_1647349168
formulas.expression: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} +60, TODAY() <= {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} + 90 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c}) + " days", "0" )

value.stringValue: IF ( [Invoice__c].DueDate__c >= TODAY(), "Due in " + TEXT([Invoice__c].DueDate__c - TODAY()) + " days", "0" )

formulas.name: formula_7_myRule_1_A1_2509888597
formulas.expression: IF ( {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} >= TODAY(), "Due in " + TEXT({!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} - TODAY()) + " days", "0" )

value.stringValue: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > [Invoice__c].DueDate__c, TODAY() <= [Invoice__c].DueDate__c +30 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - [Invoice__c].DueDate__c) + " days", "0" )

formulas.name: formula_8_myRule_1_A1_5606386549
formulas.expression: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c}, TODAY() <= {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} +30 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c}) + " days", "0" )

value.stringValue: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > [Invoice__c].DueDate__c +30, TODAY() <= [Invoice__c].DueDate__c +60 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - [Invoice__c].DueDate__c) + " days", "0" )

formulas.name: formula_9_myRule_1_A1_3808102597
formulas.expression: IF ( AND ( TODAY() > {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} +30, TODAY() <= {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c} +60 ), "Overdue " + TEXT(TODAY() - {!myVariable_current.DueDate__c}) + " days", "0" )

value.stringValue: Customer is overdue an Invoice Payment. This is a reminder to follow up with the Customer.
